src:
Evropski velikani u „klinču“ zbog Vunderkinda iz Norveške
02 Nov 2019, 11:58 by Milos
Erling Haland igra fantastično.
Norveški napadač, koji ima samo 19 godina, neumoljivo trese mreže u dresu Salcburga. U šampionatu Austrije i Ligi šampiona postigao je čak 22 gola na 15 utakmica, od kojih šest u elitnom takmičenju evropskog klupskog fudbala.
Jedno je sigurno, a to je da u Salcburgu zadovoljno trljaju ruke. Naime, 194 centimetara visokio napadač je u redove austrijskog kluba došao za pet milioan evra, a sada vredi najmanje 50 miliona. Za njegove usluge ozbiljno su zainteresovani Mančester junajted, Juventus, Real, Barselona, Atletiko Madrid, Bajern, Mančester siti, Čelsi i mnogi drugi.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
European giants in clinch over Wunderkind from Norway
02 Nov 2019, 11:58 by Milos
Erling Haland plays fantastic.
The Norwegian striker, who is only 19, is relentlessly shaking the net in Salzburg's jersey. He has scored as many as 22 goals in 15 games in the Austrian and European Championships, six of them in the elite competition of European club football.
One thing is for sure, and that in Salzburg they are happy to rub their hands. The 194-centimeter striker came to the Austrian club for five million euros, and is now worth at least 50 million. Manchester United, Juventus, Real, Barcelona, Atletico Madrid, Bayern, Manchester City, Chelsea and many others are seriously interested in his services.
